patch 8.2.2187: Python 3 test fails sometimes

Problem:    Python 3 test fails sometimes. (Christian Brabandt)
Solution:   Accept two SystemError messages.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2187: Python 3 test fails sometimes · vim/vim@07761a3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2187: Python 3 test fails sometimes · vim/vim@07761a3
attachments.text: Problem: Python 3 test fails sometimes. (Christian Brabandt) Solution: Accept two SystemError messages.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5b3d1bb0f5180266c4de4d815b3ea856a2fb3519|patch 8.2.2186: Vim9: error when using 'opfunc'>
patch 8.2.2186: Vim9: error when using 'opfunc'

Problem:    Vim9: error when using 'opfunc'.
Solution:   Do not expect a return value from 'opfunc'. (closes #7510)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2186: Vim9: error when using 'opfunc' · vim/vim@5b3d1bb
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2186: Vim9: error when using 'opfunc' · vim/vim@5b3d1bb
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: error when using 'opfunc'. Solution: Do not expect a return value from 'opfunc'. (closes #7510)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1cfb9bb5c06c07f14475f39c4eb57fea1f0dfb69|patch 8.2.2185: BufUnload is not triggered for the quickfix dummy buffer>
patch 8.2.2185: BufUnload is not triggered for the quickfix dummy buffer

Problem:    BufUnload is not triggered for the quickfix dummy buffer.
Solution:   Do trigger BufUnload. (Pontus Leitzler,closes #7518, closes #7517)
            Fix white space around "=".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2185: BufUnload is not triggered for the quickfix dummy buffer · vim/vim@1cfb9bb
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2185: BufUnload is not triggered for the quickfix dummy buffer · vim/vim@1cfb9bb
attachments.text: Problem: BufUnload is not triggered for the quickfix dummy buffer. Solution: Do trigger BufUnload. (Pontus Leitzler,closes #7518, closes #7517) Fix white space around "=".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9a963377b4811e4e0419ec8825856ff4b01331ac|patch 8.2.2184: Vim9: no error when using "2" for a line number>
patch 8.2.2184: Vim9: no error when using "2" for a line number

Problem:    Vim9: no error when using "2" for a line number.
Solution:   Give an error message if the line number is invalid. (closes #7492)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2184: Vim9: no error when using "2" for a line number · vim/vim@9a96337
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2184: Vim9: no error when using "2" for a line number · vim/vim@9a96337
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no error when using "2" for a line number. Solution: Give an error message if the line number is invalid. (closes #7492)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/60f63100b9bc1d24b7b80c81f43cf2fc3da95987|patch 8.2.2183: Vim9: value of 'edcompatible' and 'gdefault' are used>
patch 8.2.2183: Vim9: value of 'edcompatible' and 'gdefault' are used

Problem:    Vim9: value of 'edcompatible' and 'gdefault' are used.
Solution:   Ignore these deprecated options in Vim9 script. (closes #7508)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2183: Vim9: value of 'edcompatible' and 'gdefault' are used · vim/vim@60f6310
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2183: Vim9: value of 'edcompatible' and 'gdefault' are used · vim/vim@60f6310
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: value of 'edcompatible' and 'gdefault' are used. Solution: Ignore these deprecated options in Vim9 script. (closes #7508)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f4e2099e39ed4d71aed0f9a9579455aed5ec6cc2|patch 8.2.2182: Vim9: value of 'magic' is still relevant>
patch 8.2.2182: Vim9: value of 'magic' is still relevant

Problem:    Vim9: value of 'magic' is still relevant.
Solution:   Always behave like 'magic' is on in Vim9 script (closes #7509)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2182: Vim9: value of 'magic' is still relevant · vim/vim@f4e2099
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2182: Vim9: value of 'magic' is still relevant · vim/vim@f4e2099
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: value of 'magic' is still relevant. Solution: Always behave like 'magic' is on in Vim9 script (closes #7509)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a3d10a508c404a32485adc86284725e0bdc5b602|patch 8.2.2181: valgrind warnings for using uninitialized value>
patch 8.2.2181: valgrind warnings for using uninitialized value

Problem:    Valgrind warnings for using uninitialized value.
Solution:   Do not use "start" or "end" unless there is a match.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2181: valgrind warnings for using uninitialized value · vim/vim@a3d10a5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2181: valgrind warnings for using uninitialized value · vim/vim@a3d10a5
attachments.text: Problem: Valgrind warnings for using uninitialized value. Solution: Do not use "start" or "end" unless there is a match.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6f17a3f0237302b82cc31fb889d9094b51856948|patch 8.2.2180: Vim9: test for error after error is flaky>
patch 8.2.2180: Vim9: test for error after error is flaky

Problem:    Vim9: test for error after error is flaky.
Solution:   Wait for job to finish instead of a fixed delay.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2180: Vim9: test for error after error is flaky · vim/vim@6f17a3f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2180: Vim9: test for error after error is flaky · vim/vim@6f17a3f
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: test for error after error is flaky. Solution: Wait for job to finish instead of a fixed delay.

text:

patch 8.2.2179: Vim9: crash when indexing a dict with a number

Problem:    Vim9: crash when indexing a dict with a number.
Solution:   Add ISN_STOREINDEX. (closes #7513)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2179: Vim9: crash when indexing a dict with a number · vim/vim@4f5e397
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2179: Vim9: crash when indexing a dict with a number · vim/vim@4f5e397
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when indexing a dict with a number. Solution: Add ISN_STOREINDEX. (closes #7513)
